columns.name: Year
columns.description: Year of the record, ranging from 2021 to 2024.

columns.name: Month
columns.description: Month of the record, ranging from 1 (January) to 12 (December).

columns.name: Base/Project
columns.description: Categorical column indicating whether the record is associated with 'Base' or 'Project'.

columns.name: LOBGroup
columns.description: Categorical column representing the line of business group.

columns.name: CostCategory
columns.description: Categorical column indicating the type of cost category.

columns.name: PlanRate
columns.description: Continuous column representing the planned rate (monetary value) for the specific year, month, LOB, and cost category.

description: Synthetic dataset for analyzing cost categories across multiple years, months, and lines of business.
notes: This dataset is fully synthetic and created for demonstration purposes only.
